body.name: Webcam with Microphone for Desktop,1080P HD USB Webcam Live Streaming Laptop PC Computer Web Camera for Video Calling Conferencing Recording Gaming, 3D Noise Reduction
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: ★【Full HD 1080P Webcam with Autofocus Light Correction】Equipped with Full HD 1080P resolution and adopted the advanced H.264 compression techonology, the webcam powered by USB 2.0 port, delivers fabulous quality image at 30FPS, Thanks to Large Sensor for Superior Low Light and HDR technology, Computer webcam auto adjusts color and brightness for natural lighting so you always look your best on web camera even in dim light,making the video and image super clear.

★【Webcam with Built-in Stereo & 3D Automatic Noise-Canceling Microphone】Built-in stereo microphone, capturing audio within 17 feet, makes your communication clear during vedio time. Built-in dual digital stereo microphone with auto noise cancellation. Ensure that the sound is clear and free of noise.CLEARER AND MORE BEAUTIFUL--Perfectly preserves the facial details with a beautifying effect and makes your skin immaculately in an instant.

★【90°Wide-Angle & USB Webcam Plug and Play】It is extremely easy and convenient to use the webcam. Designed with standard UVC/UVA protocol USB connector, it is drive free, no need to download any other driver or software, just plug and play! Supports PCs, laptops with USB ports.The convenient foldable design allows you to easily take it anywhere, and the 6.5’ (1.5 Meter) USB cord is long enough for any task. Just plug it in and you are ready to go!

★【Rotating Base Design & Smooth Live Streaming Webcam with 360 Degree Adjustable Tripod】: Webcam can be stably placed on the desktop and clamped on the display (does not damage the screen). 360 Degree Rotation Webcam & 180 Degree adjustable Clip Folding make it a breeze to secure the camera to computer monitors, laptops, and tripods.We offer a 60-Day money-back & 2-Year free replacement & Lifetime customer service.
body.description: Specification:Name: 1080P Teatalk HD USB Webcam with Privacy Cover and TripodWeight: 136gDSP Chip: Driver-lessDynamic Resolution: 1920X1080Effective Pixels: 2.0 Mega PixelsFocus Mode: Fixed-focus with Auto light correctionRotatable：360 Degree Rotation Webcam 180 Degree Clip FoldingSignal to Noise Ratio: > 50dBInterface type: USB2.0/3.0Frame Rate: 30FPSProtocol: UVC/UVAVideo Output: USB Video StreamingWorking Voltage: DC5V/160mA ±6mAProduct Features:1080P Full HD Teatalk Webcam: Computer camera with Full HD glass lens deliver crisp image and crystal clear video at a fluid 30 frames per/sec. Plug and Play:USB webcam camera can be easily install and use, plug and play, NO additional driver required.Automatic 3D Noise Reduction: This newest webcam with microphone is built-in 2 stereo omnidirectional microphones with automatic noise reduction makes the sound purer and clearer.Easy to Set Up: It also features a tripod-ready adjustable universal base that fits to laptops, desktops, computers, PC, LCD monitors.97-Degree Wide View Angle Webcam : Fixed focus Webcam captures HD video at a wide angle up to 97 degrees, Perfect for live streaming, video calling, recording, and conferencing, etc.Wide Compatibility: Work with Windows 7/8/10, Mac OS, Linux, Chrome OS, XBOX Smart TV and Android systems; Suitable for Skype, YouTube, and other mainstream software and App .Package list:1* USB 1080P Webcam (with 1.5M USB Power Cable)1* Privacy Shutter1* 360 degree adjustable Tripod1* User Manual

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 5,639 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and sleek webcam.Easy to install on display.Plug and play.Sharp image wide angle.Firm and steady swivel.It is well-priced.Nice tripod added... all I hope is that I can find it back when I need it ;)The extra 4 lens cover for privacy is what I don't understand..why?? :)Fits nicely next to my monitor lampI am happy with the purchase and very much recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, excellent quality, terrific value
reviews.reviewText: After having to upgrade my computer to work with Zoom and other online programs all at once, I had to also purchase a webcam. I purchased this camera after reading the favorable reviews. It came right on time, packaged well, and works wonderfully. I simply plugged it in, and used the handy tripod to position the camera the way I preferred. It works great- I have received comments about how clear the image and sound are. I really like the shutter that shuts the lens when I don't want the camera on. Additionally, the service provided is great. The instructions and information are minimal, and the seller provided additional info for those with questions. Even though I didn't have questions or any problems, it is good to know how conscientious the seller is in supporting the product. Highly recommended; great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A staple tech for my telehealth biz
reviews.reviewText: I have come to rely on this camera daily for work. Pleased with its ease of setup and all its features work well. The one thing I am noticing is it has a hard time adjusting to light changes in my room. Sometimes my image looks washed out or too dark, but generally it looks great. In fact, my doctor who I met virtually asked me what kind of setup I have because it looked professional and my clients have never provided negative feedback about the image they see on their screens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great audio and camera!
reviews.reviewText: Sets up fast and easy. No drivers needed. Comes with 3 additional lens covers....not sure why. At first I thought they were different optics (wide angle etc.) but there is no mention in the instruction book. The cover on the camera looks sturdy -- don't think I'll need 3 replacements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Got this so I could have a camera on my computer. I clip on to the monior very easily and connected to the computer quickly. Used it to facetime my daughter and the picture was great. I like that it has a privacy slide on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Started streaming about 5 months ago and i was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this camera. At first it might be really bad, but with the proper lighting and applications on your PC that can control the settings of the camera (brightness, saturation, etc etc) it can get really good. I just took a screenshot of my stream which means its not really that good because in order to stream, the video gets compressed and the quality would be lower but nonetheless, out of stream, it looks very good. A lot of people have asked me what webcam I used and was surprised that it was only 20-ish bucks.. I really took a a chance on this and i’m glad I did.I ordered another one for a dog cam for my puppy bc i love it much. For the record, I did get both my webcams on sale. AND without proper lighting the camera wouldn’t look like this.I also don’t know how the sound quality is because I wouldn’t want my stream’s mic/audio coming from a webcam but instead an actual michehe if any of my twitch viewers are here lmk if you see this 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall solid product, but some issues with video
reviews.reviewText: I like this product and it’s worth the low cost—I have used it for two years now. But, seemingly at random, the video quality will become super poor: stratified lines throughout and an aggressive “blinking” between lighting that gives whoever I’m talking to a headache.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little web cam.
reviews.reviewText: Awesome web cam, it's does a job.
